sentence.idiomatic: Long time no see. You're looking a lot better.
Lately you aren't looking too well.
His complexion doesn't look too good today. Is he sick?
Your results this month are a lot better than last month.
The company's performance is so good--of course the boss is happy.
Do you have some good methods for enhancing the company's performance?
He passed all his duties off onto other people.
He put all his problems onto me, but I don't know how to solve them either.
Some parents pass off the responsibility for their kids to the school, and don't pay attention to anything themselves.
Lately your Chinese has improved a lot.
I study hard every day, but I haven't made any progress.
My work has improved a lot in comparison with before, so the boss decided to give me a promotion.
You've really stayed in shape.
We must maintain a good frame of mind every day.
Exercising more can keep one healthy?
He told me a lot of cooking tips.
I'll teach you a bargaining technique.
Your Chinese is so good. What is the key?
Everyone compliments his handsome looks.
He really knows how to suck up. Everyone he meets he compliments.
The boss often praises his diligent work.
I heard that you got a promotion. Congratulations.
I want to go work at a company that has opportunities for promotion.
I got a promotion today. I'm treating everyone to a meal.
Good morning, boss! Wow, you're looking energetic today!
Really? I feel the same as always...
Well, you're always pretty good, but you've been looking better and better lately. Our company's results are also looking good, and getting better every day.
Well, we have everyone's hard work to thank for that.
Boss, you're here early. These days a boss as dedicated as you is hard to come by!
There's a lot to do. I've got to come early.
Nowadays a lot of bosses push their work onto their employees. But you do it yourself, and teach us how to do it. We've learned a lot from you these past few years.
That's my job. Only when you all make progress does the company make progress.
Good morning boss! You look good in a suit. You've really stayed in shape. You must have some secret technique?
How can you call a belly this big ``staying in shape?"
That's just showing your success. Some people who want that can't get it.
Heh heh. What day is today? Everyone is complimenting me. Oh, that's right! Today I have to decide who gets promoted...
